User Guideïƒ

Welcome to the DeepTrees User Guide. This document will help you get started with DeepTrees and provide detailed information on its features and usage.

Table of Contentsïƒ

  1. Introduction

  2. Installation

  3. Quick Start

  4. Features

  5. Configuration

  6. Troubleshooting

  7. FAQ

  8. Contact

1. Introductionïƒ

DeepTrees is a powerful tool for analyzing and visualizing tree structures. It is designed to be easy to use and highly customizable.

2. Installationïƒ

To install DeepTrees, follow these steps:

pip install deeptrees

3. Quick Startïƒ

Here is a quick example to get you started with DeepTrees:

from deeptrees import predict
tree = deeptrees.load_tree('path/to/tree/file')
deeptrees.visualize(tree)

4. Featuresïƒ

DeepTrees offers the following features: - Feature 1 - Feature 2 - Feature 3

5. Configurationïƒ

You can configure DeepTrees using a configuration file. Here is an example configuration:

[settings]
option1 = value1
option2 = value2

6. Troubleshootingïƒ

If you encounter any issues, refer to the troubleshooting section for help.

7. FAQïƒ

Frequently Asked Questions:

Q: How do I install DeepTrees? A: Use the command pip install deeptrees.

8. Contactïƒ

For further assistance, contact us at support@deeptrees.com.
